Property.name: no_permission
Property.Value: You have no permission to view the scorecard list.

Property.name: no_permission
Property.Value: You have no permission to view the scorecard.

Property.name: no_edit_permission
Property.Value: You have no permission to edit the scorecard.

Property.name: no_copy_permission
Property.Value: You have no permission to copy the scorecard.

Property.name: no_create_permission
Property.Value: You have no permission to create the scorecard.

Property.name: incorrect_group_weights
Property.Value: The sum of group weights is not 100.

Property.name: incorrect_section_weights
Property.Value: The sum of section weights is not 100.

Property.name: incorrect_question_weights
Property.Value: The sum of question weights is not 100.

Property.name: active_scorecard_edit_error
Property.Value: The active scorecard can not be edited.

Property.name: scorecard_in_use_copy_error
Property.Value: The scorecard is currently linked to a project, the name must be changed.
